text:
"[redacted_name] pamit untuk bertemu dokter [redacted_name] dulu nek" pamit taeyong pada nenek nya, mengecup kening perempuan yang terbaring lemah di depannya ini. Kemudian berlalu dari ruangan ICCU itu
Kini mark duduk termenung, di atas kasur nya ia selalu menolak jika orang lain masuk ke kamar nya, ia menunggu dokter cantik nya kenapa sudah seminggu ini dokter cantik atau yang mark panggil mommy itu tidak pernah datang lagi kepada nya, apakah mark salah bicara atau apa membuat mommy nya tidak ingin bertemu dirinya
Jaehyun masuk ke dalam kamar mark, menatap anak angkatnya itu dari ambang pintu. Ada rasa sakit saat melihat kondisi mental mark yang semakin memburuk. Dan jaehyun tau apa penyebab nya, mark selalu bertanya tentang taeyong dan terkejut lagi saat mark memanggil mommy pada taeyong
trans:
"[redacted_name] is leaving to see Doctor [redacted_name] first, Grandma," Taeyong said to his grandmother, kissing the forehead of the woman lying weakly in front of him. Then he left the ICCU room.
Now Mark sat in contemplation, on his bed. He always refused if other people entered his room. He was waiting for his beautiful doctor; why hadn't his beautiful doctor, or who Mark called Mommy, come to him again for a week? Did Mark say something wrong, or what, that made his Mommy not want to see him?
Jaehyun entered Mark's room, looking at his adopted son from the doorway. There was a pain when he saw Mark's deteriorating mental condition. And Jaehyun knew what the cause was; Mark always asked about Taeyong and was even more surprised when Mark called Taeyong Mommy.
